SwiftMessageFormat.name: MT798
SwiftMessageFormat.Description:
This message type is used by financial institutions, with their own offices, and/or with other financial institutions with which they have established bilateral agreements.
It is used as an envelope for a specified message included in it.
It allows for the definition of a unique format for which another message type is not available or applicable.
It also allows financial institutions to use message types which are awaiting live implementation on the SWIFT system.

Validation.Comment: This field must not start or end with a slash '/' and must not contain two consecutive slashes '//' (Error code(s): T26).

fieldvalidation.name: U09
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "User has used tag 119 in a message that is not a candidate for special processing"

fieldvalidation.name: U03
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "When populating an end-to-end reference, both fields 111 and 121 must be populated: a message that contains only one of these two fields will not be accepted by FIN."

fieldvalidation.name: F77E-A
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "The maximum size of this field is limited to 9800 characters."
